data.title: GoDurham
data.text:
Join our team!

Come on board and help us get people where they need to go in the community. Consider a career at GoDurham and see where it takes you! To view positions for GoDurham ACCESS, please visit: National Express GoDurham Access Positions

Apply for ALL GoDurham Transit positions by visiting RATP DEV's website HERE.

To apply for a GoDurham job, select "Durham, NC" as the location or by searching "GoDurham."

Find the job you want to apply for and hit "apply."

Create an RATP Dev login or sign in to your RATP Dev account.

Fill out the application provided.

GoDurham HR will contact you if you are selected to move forward in the hiring process.

Positions available (apply for these positions on RATP Dev website):

Bus Operator

Mechanic

Check our our ad featuring Wool E. Bull above!
